useNewBroadcastUI.tooltip: Enable a beta version of the broadcaster controller UI (Default: false).

tvStyleAnimations.tooltip: Auto-hide the driver information widgets on screen after a few seconds. (Default: true).

showStandingsManufacturer.tooltip: Show the manufacturer logo in the standings tower. A use case to disable this would be in single car cup classes like NSU or Porsche GT3 Cup (Default: true).

showTyreCompound.tooltip: Show the tyre compound in the driver info widget for applicable classes. (Default: True)

indentFocusedDriver.tooltip: Indent the focused driver in the standings widget (Default: False).

showPortalTeam.tooltip: Show a drivers portal team name if they have added one (Default: False).

showPortalAvatar.tooltip: Show a drivers portal avatar in place of the country flag (Default: False).

showFullStandingsName.tooltip: Show the full middle and last names of drivers in the standings tower (Default: False).

showRelativeStandingsTiming.tooltip: Show relative timings on the standings tower to the driver in front rather than the leader during race sessions (Default: False).

autoDirectorOnlyMode.tooltip: When enabled, the auto director will only direct a race and won't turn on widgets by itself. Useful for jumping between manual & auto directing without having to turn on/off specific widgets each time (Default: False).

showLiveryPreview.tooltip: Show the livery of the car on the driver info and compare driver widgets (Default: True).

showComparisonSpeed.tooltip: Show the comparison speed (in KM/H) between 2 drivers in the compare info widget (Default: False).

showSlowDownAlerts.tooltip: Show slow down alerts from the stewards (Default: False).

showServerNameInTimer.tooltip: Shows the name of the server in the session info timer widget (Default: False).

alertLength.tooltip: Specify how long steward alerts should be shown on screen in seconds (Default: 15 Seconds).

qualifyingResultsDisplayTime.tooltip: The amount of seconds before the end of qualifying to display the results on screen (Default: 25 Seconds)

continueToNextSessionTime.tooltip: The amount of seconds before the continuing to the next session after a race has finished. This also affects how long the results screen is shown for. A value lower than 30 seconds is not recommended! (Default: 45 Seconds).
